message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I think this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $900000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $750000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our prices. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $850000. I'm willing to go up to $800000 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise.
